panels.description:
Show the rack services that are in a {Off, Dead, Unknown} status.
Services that are in an "ON" status are not shown.
panels.title: Rack Services Status (system_id=$racks)

panels.description: Average latency of rack to region rpc calls in $__rate_interval interval
panels.title: Rack -> Region calls avg latency

panels.description: Time necessary to fetch machines through the v2 API
panels.title: Machine Listing percentiles (v2)

panels.description: Time necessary to fetch machines through websockets. Includes a call to the v2 machine listing.
panels.title: Machine Listing percentiles (WS)

panels.description:
API calls with error status codes, grouped by status code, in the last 30 minutes.
Click on a value to visualize which API calls are failing.
panels.title: 4xx/5xx responses count (last 30m)

panels.description: Shows which API calls are failing with the specified status code. To modify the visualization (i.e. the status code) use the panel above.
panels.title: API calls with $status_code response
